item.description:
This is sponsored and delivered by my good friend Chris Adshade.

His description

Taking Charge of Your Thoughts with Hypnosis

This Wednesday night we will have a low key meetup around taking charge of your thoughts.  Most of our society tends to jump on the negative or we get wrapped up obsessing on certain things that dont lead us down productive paths many times.  This can lead to all sorts of personal problems, problems at home and in the work place. 

Since we didnt get a chance to meet up in March (ok I was busy)....it would be nice to meet up for an informal meeting.  The first part of the meetup will be a laid back social to chat and meet each other.  This will allow folks to find some common interests that people in the group may have.  Than we will do a hypnosis session on "Taking Charge of Your Thoughts" to curtail or change your thoughts and empower you to do so in different areas of your life. 

I look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Best to park in the back and we will be downstairs in the Story Hour Room

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Taking Charge of Your Thoughts
